Name: Shadowy work in Khan's Heart
Description: Your Network needs something, to prosper. What is it? [If you provide this successfully, your Network level may increase.]

DefaultEvent.Description: This is a scarf, from a traveller lost in the East. This is a clock, repaired on Irem. This is the dream that Salt has sent you, whispered in the ear of your agent. It may be nothing but delusions... but it's what your agent wanted. When she's finished weeping, she goes about her business. All shall be well, and all manner of thing shall be well.

ChildBranches.Name: A blessing
ChildBranches.Description: Spies are more superstitious even than zailors. This one awaits an omen.

DefaultEvent.Name: Boldness rewarded
DefaultEvent.Description: The White-and-Golds snap up your bait. Their spycatcher is too eager in pursuing more. You pass him plausible nonsense; and he's hooked.

ChildBranches.Name: Bait!
ChildBranches.Description: Use a mouse to catch a rat. [Gain Vital Intelligence by tapping your network in Khan's Heart. Succeed or fail, this will use up the Intelligence.]

DefaultEvent.Name: A peerless taste
DefaultEvent.Description: Your Khaganian dupe knows the taste of honey, now. They know what its like to walk in dream-palaces and rapture-gardens. They'll never be free of you.

ChildBranches.Name: Prisoner's Honey
ChildBranches.Description: Khan's Heart is a darkly gleaming miracle of a city. But it's no paradise. Someone is looking for paradise.

DefaultEvent.Name: This one weird old trick
DefaultEvent.Description: The room is booked. The dinner is arranged. The special dish is prepared. The sign is made. The boatman is bribed. The bat is drugged. And it goes off flawlessly.

ChildBranches.Name: It just might work
ChildBranches.Description: Oh God. This old trick again. Well, sometimes it works. And all it needs is a sack of coffee beans, a shakerful of Mutersalt and the name of the newest spy in town...

DefaultEvent.Name: A hard bargainer
DefaultEvent.Description: Over the years, your contact has learnt to control her appetites. She wants what you can offer, but she won't throw in anything extra.

ChildBranches.Name: Someone has a habit
ChildBranches.Description: They call it red honey, or gaoler's honey. It is made in utmost secret, by very bad people. It's, ah, quite wonderful on the tongue. [This will increase your Network substantially, although not past 7.]

DefaultEvent.Name: Times change
DefaultEvent.Description: Spies' desires are capricious and diverse.

ChildBranches.Name: Seek another opportunity
ChildBranches.Description: Perhaps you simply can't obtain what you need. Let the opportunity pass. Come back later. [This will allow you to choose another mission when you come back - usually, but not always, a different one. It will cost Something Awaits You.]

DefaultEvent.Name: A closely written report
DefaultEvent.Description: You speak of the sirocco scents of the Mediterranean, the heart-filling shape of mountains against the evening. Each word you give them is repaid threefold.

ChildBranches.Name: A dream of the Sun
ChildBranches.Description: Someone misses home. Bring them news of the Surface.

DefaultEvent.Name: Satisfaction
DefaultEvent.Description: Your gift is deemed sufficient. This Leopard princeling will be prepared to pass on gossip from Khan's Glory. Discreetly. Courteously. When the time is right.

ChildBranches.Name: A collector
ChildBranches.Description: Your agent has a contact in the Leopard. But the sons and daughters of the Leopard are always hungry for treasures. [This will increase your Network substantially, although not past 7.]

DefaultEvent.Name: No word
DefaultEvent.Description: The Agent disappears into the teeming streets of Khan's Glory like a beetle into leaf-mould. You wait. And wait. And wait...

ChildBranches.Name: A Diplomatic Agent
ChildBranches.Description: The Voracious Diplomat, in London, can provide the kind of specialist assistance you need.

DefaultEvent.Name: Intercepted!
DefaultEvent.Description: The White-and-Golds found your courier. No doubt they'll find a satisfying use for your funds.

ChildBranches.Name: Cash
ChildBranches.Description: Spies have an extraordinary appetite for funds. Bribes, hush-money, peculiar equipment...

DefaultEvent.Name: Not quite exceptional
DefaultEvent.Description: An easy mistake. Anyone could have made it. You can't be expected to keep track of everything. But now someone's keeping track of you.

ChildBranches.Name: Your cunning is required
ChildBranches.Description: This will need your personal attention.
